name: Anvil Spartan
description:
Manufacturer: Anvil Aerospace
Focus: Troop Transport
Built on Anvil’s robust Atlas Platform, the same chassis used for their devastating Ballista air defense system, the Spartan is a fully armored transport outfitted with eight jump seats. The Spartan’s rugged frame makes it perfect for all kinds of terrain, and its remote Gatling turret helps clear the area for easier deployment.
description_cn:
制造商：铁砧航天(Anvil Aerospace)
定位：运兵
基于铁砧牢固的阿特拉斯平台，也就是强有力的弩炮对空防御系统的同一个底盘而打造，斯巴达是一辆全副武装的运输载具，配备有8个折叠式座椅。斯巴达坚固的车架结构让其成为任何地形的完美之选；遥控加特林炮塔还能扫清区域内的敌人，更方便部署兵力。
